Oct. 13, 2001 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Fourth Section)

Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - percussion - Goodwick. Prizes - 1st £120, 2nd £80, 3rd £60. 5 bands competed.
